original_text:
Your choicest valleys are full of chariots,
    and horsemen are posted at the city gates.
korean_text: 병거는 네 아름다운 골짜기에 가득하였고 마병은 성문에 정렬되었도다

sentences.original_text: Your choicest valleys are full of chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 네 가장 아름다운 골짜기들은 병거들로 가득 찼고

sentences.original_text: and horsemen are posted at the city gates
